root: ^I've heard more about your exploits around the village.
^Are you quite finished for the day? Or should I expect to see you around even more.
^ No, I still have more work to do.

c-0: ^I'm finished with helping the villagers. I was actually on my way home.
c-1: ^I have a bit more to do around the village before I can go back to Mother.
g-0: ^I would think it tiring, all this sorcery and potions and other witchcraft.
^Perhaps a moment of respite is on the horizon?
^It can be tiring but Mother was able to manage so I think I can as well.
^Still, surely you both could use some time to yourselves, away from the village.
^Maybe sooner than you think. A brief rest would do everyone some good!
^I'll make sure the village won't fall completely to the ground in your absence.
^I... don't believe it will ever come to that but it's so nice to see you have Mother and I in your thoughts.
